page.title: 02 BEACHES by Karen Macdonald
page.content:
BEACHES byKaren Macdonald.
One of the beaches in Brixham is called the Breakwater Beach. It was formed when the Breakwater was built to stop the sea smashing up into the Town. At Breakwater there is a slipway where most of the boats launch from. Every year the Swimming Club has a Breakwater Swim, when people swim along the length of the Breakwater.
SWIMMING CLUB The Swimming Club has a heated , indoor,swimming pool on Ranscombe Rd. just opposite the Community College. Members of the public can use the Pool as well as the members of the Club. The Swimming Pool has been there about twelve years and was built by a group of local townspeople led by Mr. Tomlin. It was opened by the Mayor.
